remarks: Norm of differences around common element.  Part of Lemma 3.6 of [Beran] p. 101.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
norm3dif.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
norm3dif.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
norm3dif.3 $e |- C e. ~H $.
norm3adifii $p |- ( abs ` ( ( normh ` ( A -h C ) ) - ( normh ` ( B -h C ) ) ) ) <_ ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) $.
